reviewText:
The English Host Needs To Say Less And Let The Featured Chef Describe How He Or
She Wants To Showcase Their Cuisine  -  Less Is Best  -  Take A Back Seat Mon Pot ..
The sound on my video was perfectly fine my husband loved this show and it only ran 1 season  I wish it wasn't $10 an episode

The sound was really bad, couldn't tell what they were saying.

Love the program and i know they were saying something good, but seemed like like everything was an inside joke.
